title: Get Beautiful
author: Becky
citation: Becky. "Get Beautiful: experience with 5-MeO-DMT (ID 883)". Erowid.org. Jul 13, 2000. erowid.org/exp/883
footer: Age at time of experience: Not Given

[ View as PDF (for printing) ] [ View as LaTeX (for geeks) ]
[ Switch Colors ]
report:
Get Beautiful
Closer, 
Minds open easy-
get beautiful, 
more useful, if flowers grow
in the unconsious.
Serenity siezes you quickly
impaling your evils, 
holding them to a clearer light
which causes hate to dissipate. 
It's time to reconsider, 
time to renegotiate-
reality,
as a whole
And then with eyes fully open
maybe the mind dances naturally. 
Like colors that breath, 
the same as i do 
when ever sleep brings struggle, 
and then sanity.
Believe- 
you are divine, 
concieve now
all anger benign. 
Within the world where peace pulses 
through my body. 
Endlessly, 
or ten minutes that comes in the pretence of forever. 
Without malignance,
with holding reason-
and still nothing at all. 
With passion that makes you alive 
and god inside of you, 
glorifying your mind 
and limbs
and nerves. 
through spasms of shiva
flowing always in you. 
Realize your breath-
get beautiful.
yeah, i think i liked it.
